name: Thief Of Elements
description:
Thief Of Elements is a platform game which will make you challenge your skill and patience in learning the levels! Game is still in alpha version but it is a playable game, which contains things like dash, grappling hook, double jump, many obstacles and more content!

Check it out and give me feedback about the game!

Since game itself doesn't contain the tutorial yet, here's the explanation for all the things that are in the game:

WASD - use to control main character!

Space - use to Jump, if clicked twice, you can use Double Jump!

Shift - use it to Dash, if you hold shift, the game will slow it's time, so you can control better where you dash!

Grapple points - When you click RMB on them, you get attached to them with grapple hook. You use them to get faster from point A to point B!

Collectibles - For now they're only there to collect, but in future you will be able to buy upgrades for them, score every collectible on every level for max satisfaction!

Checkpoint - When you encounter this yellow triangle, it means you got to checkpoint, the next time you die, you'll respawn on this triangle!
